column4: Hey has anyone installed ubuntu on a "compaq presario f5000" laptop
you tried the f key option for vga?
hmm well mine is similar model only trouble I had was had to switch off wireless during live cd boot and use vga then after installed it I installed nvidia and blacklisted the broadcom driver
which vga mode resolution are you using?
does the cd check go alright?
hmm try 800x600 if that is option it usually works
if you install from alternate cd though you could boot up and press esc to enter recovery console and install nvidia
I managed to install using safe graphics mode... but I couldn't get the installed system to start
yeah it doesn't have safe graphics option so install through grub recovery console
you suggest an alternate install? and whne do I isntall what how...
start it up and press esc when you see it mention grub. choose use recovery console as root.
ok.. so I press etc and it says I am leaving the graphical boot menu and starting the text mode interface
